title: shs_permission_form
text: High School Summer School Programs Student Leave Form I hereby authorize and consent the student, whose parent I am, who is participating in the Sabanc覺 University High School Summer Schools program (High School Summer School, Summer High School, English Summer School, Applied Nanotechnology Summer School, and Entrepreneurship and Innovation Summer School), whose information is listed below, to leave the Sabanc覺 University campus at any time between ...../....../202.. and ....../...../202.. Both myself and the student have been informed that the student must enter the Sabanc覺 University campus by 8:00 PM at the latest. I acknowledge and declare that Sabanc覺 University has no responsibility for the student's absence from campus, and that I assume full responsibility for the student during this time.
